Message: I'm really sorry you're feeling this way. You're not alone — there are people who care about you and want to help.💙 Please reach out to someone you trust or contact a mental health professional.**If you’re in immediate danger**, please call emergency services or reach out to a suicide prevention hotline:- 🇺🇸 USA: 988- 🇮🇳 India: 9152987821 (AASRA)- 🌍 Global: [Find hotlines](https://findahelpline.com)You're valued and your life matters. Talking to someone can make a big difference.
